verse.roman:
evaṁ vikatthamāne vai
kaṁse prakupito 'vyayaḥ
laghimnotpatya tarasā
mañcam uttuṅgam āruhat

synonyms: evam—thus; vikatthamāne—exclaiming with audacity; vai—indeed; kaṁse—Kaṁsa; prakupitaḥ—becoming extremely angry; avyayaḥ—the infallible Lord; laghimnā—with ease; utpatya—jumping up; tarasā—swiftly; mañcam—the royal platform; uttuṅgam—tall; āruhat—climbed onto.
translation: As Kaṁsa thus raved so audaciously, the infallible Lord Kṛṣṇa, intensely angry, quickly and easily jumped up onto the high royal dais.
